data.persona: I envy the queen. I would like to be her she is so beutifull. I dislike working long hours and being treated badly. I am good at my job and leave rooms shiny.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
A plain damp room with many barrels of beer and wine.  The room is in need of a good cleaning as the floor is dirty and rats scurry about.
There's a wine and a beer here.
The spider is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I'm going to set traps to kill the rats in the storage room
data.long_motivation: I'm going to completely clean the storage room and rid it of pests
